extension.name: Gift Memberships
extension.description: This extension allows people to purchase gift memberships through a price set, generates redemption codes and can redeem the code to create a new membership
extension.comments: In order to use this extension you will need to create two contribution pages. A page where you purchase gift memberships using a priceset that uses gift membership fields and a page where you redeem your memberhsip with a priceset that uses a gift redeem price field. For more please refer to the README.md file
